comment: Dr South is one of the best chem professors out there!! As a person who hated chemistry and felt like I wasn't good enough, I was so pleased by her lectures and chemistry started to make more sense! She explains really well and makes the material easier to understand! I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND! You will be in good hands for upper chemistry courses!

Professor South was a great teacher. Very clear and good at explaining things. im in summer class and she somehow keeps us engaged for 3 hour lectures. dont take the summer course unless youve taken chem before because she moves fast. But if youve taken chem youre set. Shes a great prof and takes time to answer all questions

She's a great professor who really tries to help her students succeed. She explains things clearly and gives good examples to make the material easier to understand. The class itself is just tough because of the content, but she definitely makes it more manageable and less intimidating with her support.

She explains topics well, really good lecturer and actually teaches off her own slides and will write on slides through the class. Easy to find outside of class and answers emails fairly quickly. She does have participation quizzes every class but drops a couple for every unit. Gives practice exams, just take her you will be in good hands.

Dr. South is a wonderful chem professor and she is very caring towards her students and their success. She posts all her lecture recordings and if you do the practice tests and extra practices, you should be fine on the tests. She is very willing to help out if you need it and is very easy to talk to. Would take her again and again!!

She is trying to be helpful but it is better that if she tries to make her exams easier to help students. Attendance is mandatory and there are several question quizzes everyday for attendance. I am a A student and I'm having B- right now. One of the exam felt like I am reading something not English.

Overall a good person. She is a little passive aggressive/millennial jokes that aren't actually funny. If you are a bad test taker, take a different professor. Even if you get all 100%s on homework and attendance grades, if you get Cs on your tests, you will not pass. She does replace low test scores with the % you got in that section on final.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: I TOOK THE LECTURE not lab. She's an amazing professor for a hard course. She's who you want teaching this kind of class. Lecture heavy but amazing at explaining everything. Yes take her lol

This is the absolute best professor I could ever had asked for. She was very understanding if you were sick. She records her lectures so you can go back and watch them. She is very kind and is always willing to help. Go to the common study hours, It goes a long way! Ask questions, you will learn a lot more.
Dr. South was an amazing Professor. She honestly just wanted you to succeed, and she gave you all the resources you needed to succeed. If you show up and study, you will be fine.

My favorite professor by far at KSU. Gives you so many resources to help you in the class and is extremely accessible outside of class. Material itself was moderately hard, but she explains it greatly and I was able to make a B+ on the final and end the class with an A.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Had her for 1152 lab and she was amazing. Explained concepts effortlessly and answered any questions. She provided feedback immediately after grading labs. I wish she had been my 1152 professor. Weekly assignments (quiz & lab submission) along with one final. Do yourself a favor and take her for anything

I took the 1211 lecture. She was an amazing professor. Replaced all ur test scores with the % of question on the final. Very friendly and accessible outside of class in her office. 10/10 experience for a hard course.

I have her for CHEM 1152L and she's the best professor ever. She cares, explains labs well, and gives feedback on submitted assignments. Her class is easy to pass if you pay attention.
TAKE HER!!! SHE'S THE BEST!!

She was a really amazing lab teacher, I didn't have her for lecture but I heard similar things. Very kind and professional and willing to help you as much as you need!! Lab reports were graded fairly and came out of the mandatory lab manual, but she had PDFs available for the worksheets online. It's plenty of work but that's summer courses for you.
She gives some of the best lectures I have ever had! I love how she works through the concepts as she teaches them instead of just shoving material at you.

I would definitely recommend taking Dr.south for chemistry. She provides lots of chances to get your grade up in the class and is very understanding. She also records her lectures and has you follow along with her during class which helps to understand the material.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is the best chemistry teacher I've ever had. I have nothing but great things to say about her. She explains everything well, gave lecture topics beforehand, blank powerpoints to annotate with her, posts a video of every lecture after class and the annotated notes. Her tests were fair and she gave points back if the average was low. Take her!!!!

While the content of this class was difficult, Professor South made it all so easy to understand. She is so kind and truly cares about her students, and she is one of the best professors I've had at KSU. There are homework assignments after each class, a few quizzes, 4 tests, and a final. It is all very manageable though. Take her!
She is a great professor. She is always willing to help her students. She is very good at explaining the content and making it easier to understand.
Chem 1152 isn't easy but Dr. South makes things easier to learn and knows how to clearly teach the subject. I would take this course with Dr. South again.

Love her! She works with her students, has detailed lectures, and the homework is a great study tool and helps boost your grade. Tests and quizzes are not bad at all. Chem is hard, but she makes it at least understandable. Have an A right now before the final with moderate effort. Take! GO TO LECTURES!

Dr. South is amazing!!! She cares and is always willing to help! She gives a well-formatted study guide that is a good representation of what you will find on each test! She gives practice questions in class and goes over them with you. There is a bit of homework, but it's good practice! Take her if you can! You won't regret it!!

Chem is hard. She does try her best and make sure everyone understand the material. Lots of homework for the little amount that it counts towards your grade, but it's manageable. She does have favorites, but it's easy to become it, if you want just talk to her. Exams are made just like the notes, so if you study that then you'll be fine.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I took Professor South for the summer course and her style of teaching works well for Ochem. She goes into the different things you need to know and writes them out. A lot of homework but it is very helpful practice for tests.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: Dr. South is awesome! She grades on homework, tests, and attendance. She drops the lowest test grade, and of the three that are not dropped, the final exam score can replace your lowest test score. She gives a lot of room for error and truly cares for her students. Take her if possible!

Science was never my strong suit and even though I finished with a C, I thought I would have to take the class again. Take advantage of the office hours, recordings of practice tests and lectures , practice tests and homework. She will help you understand. Pay attention to the lectures and write fast.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Lecture heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: TAKE HER!!!! chem is a hard class and requires studying a lot but she is there to help you. she post practice tests, recordings going over practice tests, and so many other resources! homework is due twice a week and 4 tests and a final! i was never really good at science but i finished with a A because of her! take her seriously she is the best!

Professor South is by far the best chemistry teacher you can take. In my lab class with another student everyone was very confused at certain topics but anyone in south's class knew it. She's very thorough in her teachings and posts recording of her lectures. You have a homework assignment due before every class but it helps you stay on track.

Professor South is one of the best professors I have had at KSU! I am so glad I got her as my teacher for 1152 as that class is tough. She is very thorough with her teaching, and her tests are ver similar to her study guides. Three tests plus final and homework every week. Take her!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Lecture heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: Chemistry is difficult, however, I would not have been as successful as I was had it not been for Dr. South. She takes her time in lectures and explains the material to make sure everyone understands the concepts. I absolutely 100% recommend you take Dr. South if you want to be successful in this class! SHE IS THE BEST!

Chemistry is a very hard class and has never been my best subject. Professor South however, was an amazing professor and made the difficult material very easy to digest. She gives practice test that are very similar to the real test, so if you do good on those you are likely to do well on the actual test. I 100% recommend taking her as a professor.

I LOVED Dr. South. She was the best professor I have ever had at KSU. The course material was very difficult and you definitely have to put in the work and study, but Dr. South was there to explain anything we needed in the most clear way possible. Never once did I feel lost in her lectures. I would 100% recommend her to anyone!

Dr. South is new to KSU, but shes AMAZING!! Extremely helpful lectures and everything is accessible on D2L so if you miss class youll be fine and can catch up later. Lots of practice tests that are similar to the test. A hard class but she does a great job teaching it.

Dr. South is a wonderful professor. She is organized, her lectures follow with the material in the book, she is approachable, and she makes the class engaging. She sets you up for success, but be prepared to do the work. Ochem requires a lot of study time and homework effort outside of the classroom. Put in the work and you will do well.

Dr. South is really wonderful! O-Chem is regarded as one of the hardest classes ever, and Dr. South made it extremely digestible and easy to understand. There is an absolute ton of work and you have to put forth the effort, but there's no fluff in Dr. South's class. Took a little bit of time to come into her own, but she's a real gem. Take her!
